Title: Provides for initiative and referendum and recall
Summary: Provides for initiative and referendum and recall; empowers the electors with the ability to propose statutes and amendments to the constitution, approve or reject statutes or parts of statutes, and remove elective officers.
LawCode: Ren Art 20 to be Art 21, add Art 20 §§1 - 12, Constn
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing the addition of a new article 20 to the constitution, in relation to providing for initiative and referendum and recall
